channel.title: How Do you Make Shops!?
channel.description:
Okies i want to spawn an npc that sells stuff ina shop. I used to know how to do this but i just completely forgot >.< Can Someone Tell me how to do this?
For example, I want to spawn a ghost banker (id 1007) I want to make it have a shop when u talk to him. I want it to work!! :] ty

item.title: How Do you Make Shops!?
item.dc:creator: @sicarius99 sicarius99
item.description:
@sicarius99 wrote:

open up client .java and look for

}' after 'WanneShop = 2;'

under that add this

else if (NPCID == 1007) { PutNPCCords = true; WanneShop = 30; }

next open up shops.cfg and add this in

30	example_shop_name	1	1	1377	 1000	1377	 1000	1377	 1000	1377	 1000	1377	 1000	1377	 1000	1377	 1000	1377	 1000

make sure to change item id’s and stuff ot what you want him to sell.

next open up autospawn.cfg and add this in there

 1007	0	0	0	0	0	0	0	1

and that should do it but make sure to change everything to what you want…

Read full topic
